body_html:
I think this is working as intended. You are feeding in a bmp image that has only 1 channel and telling the operation that it should expect 3 channels.

https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image/decode_image the documentation says that channels=None or 0 means 'automatically figure it out'. Otherwise channels is used as a specification to enforce.

Decode with channels=0 and then use something like grayscale_to_rgb if you need to guarantee that all images are 3 channels as output.
